LanguageData.PDHK.owndoor.label: Escaping prisoners can open their own door
LanguageData.PDHK.owndoor.description: To simulate that the prisoners have found a way to open the door when the prison-break happens you can allow them to be able to open the door to their own cell but not other doors
LanguageData.PDHK.logging.label: Enable verbose logging
LanguageData.PDHK.logging.tooltip: Shows verbose logging, for finding errors
LanguageData.PDHK.version.label: Installed mod-version: {0}
